title: Profitable KDP Keyword Research Method - Easy and free, great for beginners

tactics.name: niching_down_with_extensions
tactics.description: Use chrome extensions to expand keyword suggestions and narrow search niches to reduce competition
steps: Decide on a broad niche (e.g. activity books)
Use Amz Suggestion Expander to find customer search terms
Filter results by niche (e.g. activity books for adults)
Check BSR and review counts for competitiveness
Further narrow niches (e.g. activity books for dementia patients)
caveats: Requires incognito mode to avoid search bias
source_quotes: we want to search in all categories not books because this is where most our customers on amazon search

tactics.name: BSR Analysis
tactics.description: Use Amazon Best Seller Rank (BSR) to identify profitable niches by finding books with low BSR numbers and high search result visibility.
steps: Install Amazon Quick View extension for instant product details
Look for 3-4 books with BSR under 300,000 in target niche
Verify search results under 1,000 for keyword
caveats: Requires manual checking of multiple niches
example_niches: Activity books for adults with dementia
source_quotes: we want to find books that have a bsr of under 300 000 on average

heuristics.name: competition_filter
source_quotes: 60 000 is quite a lot we really ideally want to find niches where the results are less than a thousand

heuristics.name: Niche Validation
heuristics.condition: If multiple books in a niche have low BSR and visible search results, then it's a viable niche
source_quotes: if we have thousand results or less and three or four books on the first page that have a bsl of under 300 000 then that is a good niche

claims.statement: Amazon search results are influenced by customer search history and displayed search terms
source_quotes: amazon then shows them a selection of what they think is a good match for their search

claims.statement: Amazon does not provide search volume data directly to sellers
source_quotes: amazon doesn't tell that number to anybody

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience needs with specialized content
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Reduces competition while addressing niche demand
source_quotes: activity book for adults with dementia i know it says over 1 000 results but this is pretty good
